title: Mitosis: how cells divide and multiply
creator_credit: CSIRO, A.S. Fraser and D.G. Perrin
brief_description: Uses simple animation to show the essential changes in the nucleus leading up to its division into two daughter cells. Explains why each daughter cell contains the same number of chromosomes as the parent cell.
description: Uses simple animation to show the essential changes in the nucleus leading up to its division into two daughter cells. Explains why each daughter cell contains the same number of chromosomes as the parent cell.
